sentences.sContent: She gave him a perfunctory smile.
sentences.sCn: 她对他漫不经心地笑了笑。
掌声听上去是在敷衍了事。

synos.tran: 敷衍的；马虎的；得过且过的

remMethod.val: per(表面) + funct(做) + ory → 做表面功夫 → 敷衍的

trans.tranCn: 敷衍的；马虎的；得过且过的
trans.tranOther: a perfunctory action is done quickly, and is only done because people expect it
